item.title: Dealing with Injury
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_557" align="alignright" width="300" caption="It would be easier if they could put a cone on me to keep me from exercising when I'm injured"][/caption]

We all have times in our lives when we find ourselves unable to do the things we love, often because we did too much of the things we love. Whether it's cutting back on delicious pies because we had too many in one sitting last winter or cutting back our training load because we hurt ourselves, we get ourselves into situations that we regret, doing something we knew we shouldn't have done at the time, but did anyway.
